actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend subchapter III of chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, relating to civil service retirement, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides that for purposes of civil service retirement annuities of schedule of computation for the annuity of Federal employees shall be replaced by a computation of 2 percent of the employee's average pay plus $25, when such substitution will result in a larger annuity. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8339(a)).

titles.title: A bill to amend subchapter III of chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, relating to civil service retirement, and for other purposes.
